mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into shop (created_time, updated_time, name, rating, price_per_consumer, latitude, longitude, category_id, tags, start_time, end_time, address, seller_id, icon_url) values (#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pricePerConsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update shop
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rating = #{rating,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price_per_consumer = #{pricePerConsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shop set created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price_per_consumer = #{pricePerConsumer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon_url = #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from shop order by id ASC

select
,ceil(1 + 1000*(2 * 6378.137* ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN(PI() * (#{latitude} - latitude) / 360), 2) + COS(PI() * #{latitude} / 180) * COS(latitude* PI() / 180) * POW(SIN(PI() * (#{longitude} - longitude) / 360), 2))))) AS distance from shop order by (0.95*1/log10(distance)+ 0.05*rating/5) DESC
